job_title: Physical Therapist Assistant in New London, NH
pros: trusted to do our jobs without micro management respected drama free workplace pays well mileage reimbursement
cons: been here 8 months and have found no cons and this is after 10 years with same position previously

job_title: Office Assistant in New London, NH
cons: Things seem to be changing toward a stricter environment.

job_title: PTA Assistant in New London, NH
pros: Appropriate training in preparation to work in home setting. Supervisors available in the event guidance is needed
cons: Large territory to travel at times

review_title: Could be great with an overhaul
job_title: Nurse Case Manager in New London, NH
pros: The job has decent pay, benefits similar to others in the area, and great patients
cons: Supervisory staff are rude, petty, and not helpful. The focus is clearly on the ability to compete visits quickly rather than provide good care. Staff are not valued or given clear instructions. One nurse was forced out for speaking up and a lot of us are considering leaving after realizing we all have the same concerns

review_title: AVOID- Quantity of visits is prioritized
job_title: RN Case Manager in New London, NH
pros: Field clinicians are amazing to work with.
cons:
Non-existent staff orientation
Inept management
Unrealistic patient assignments
Poor Covid 19 response plan
Inadequate PPE
Ineffective communication

job_title: Administrative Staff in New London, NH
pros: The best thing about working in the LSRVNA office is the friendly staff and accepting environment. The were very accommodating to my hours as I am a working mom.  Also very understanding if you have to call out sick.
cons: I feel there could be a little more education on how others roles affect each others work. If we had a deeper understanding of how it all connects, we could perform better and more efficiently.

job_title: Fiscal Human Resources Associate in New London, NH
pros: LSVNA is flexible and listens to employees.  Keeps up with technology and future focus.  Employees are a close knit team and support each other.
cons: I do not find any down sides to working here.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in New London, NH
pros: Supportive staff and an atmosphere of teamwork. Very positive, upbuilding place to work.
cons: Must use compensation time for holidays. No paid holidays
